name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lumin: PDF Editor, Edit, Sign, Merge, Share and Print PDFs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View, edit, and share PDF documents.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The PDF extension that actually extends: with Lumin you can read, sign, edit and print PDFs straight from your Chrome browser.

Lumin puts all the PDF editing tools you need in one place, so you can make more impact with less admin.

Join over 90 million users worldwide to access shortcuts for your favourite tools: 

EXTENSION FEATURES:
- edit PDFs
- merge PDFs
- eSign or send PDFs for signature

Lumin is cloud-based and fully integrated with Google Workspace, so you can edit PDFs from your mobile, tablet or desktop.

HOW TO GET STARTED:
1. Download the Lumin extension for Chrome 
2. Drag and drop any PDF into your browser to read it instantly (for free!)
3. Sign in to select and use the tools you need easily

Night owls, we see you! You can turn on dark mode to read in comfort.

Lumin is designed to be user-friendly, so using these tools should feel like second nature. If it doesn’t, let us know! We’re always trying to improve.
